from ic import aws

@resource
def brick(name):
    role = aws.iam.role(
        "role",
        assume_role_policy_document={
            "Statement": {
                "Effect": "Allow",
                "Principal": {"Service": "lambda.amazonaws.com"},
                "Action": "sts:AssumeRole",
            }
        }
    )
    aws.lambda_.function(
        "fn",
        function_name=name,
        runtime="python3.6",
        role=role["arn"],
        handler="index.handle",
        code={"zip_file": "def handle(): ..."}
    )
